com.paydiant.android.ui.service.loyalty

Class LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.ui.service.loyalty.LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoyaltyManagementListener

    public class LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements ILoyaltyManagementListener
    Provides empty implementation for ILoyaltyManagementListener interface. Any classes that need to use a subset of the ILoyaltyManagementListener methods can utilize this adapter class by overriding the required methods. 

           LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter loyaltyManagementListenerAdapter = new LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter() {
          @Override
          public void onRetrieveAvailableLoyaltyProgramsSuccess(List loyaltyProgramList) {
          }
          
          @Override
          public void onLoyaltyManagementError(PaydiantException exception) {
          }
      };
      iLoyaltyManagementService.setLoyaltyManagementListener(loyaltyManagementListenerAdapter);
    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

      • onLoyaltyManagementError

        public void onLoyaltyManagementError(PaydiantException exception)
        Description copied from interface: ILoyaltyManagementListener
        Gets called on loyalty management error. Refer to the ILoyaltyManagerService class for the error status codes returned for each loyalty operations.
        Specified by:
        onLoyaltyManagementError in interface ILoyaltyManagementListener
        Parameters:
        exception - PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the erroneous status codes and the loyalty event that the error occurred.
